item.title: Comment on USA fact of the day by Ted Craig
item.description:
Reply to joan:

Does out of pocket include the cost of insurance , the medicare tax, and employers share that reduces your wages

No, it means everything after that, just as the measure for the other countries is after all the taxes collected to pay for their “free” healthcare.

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/09/usa-fact-of-the-day-8.html?commentID=160812074
